doc:
Charles Cyphers https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Cyphers 0 Charles Cyphers (born July 28, 1939) is an American actor who has starred in many films and on television. He is known in the horror movie community for his work in the films of John Carpenter, especially his role as Sheriff Leigh Brackett in Carpenter's 1978 hit horror movie Halloween. He reprised this role in the 1981 sequel Halloween II. He is not related to actor Jon Cypher, alongside whom he starred in Hill Street Blues. Charles_Cyphers ( born July_28_,_1939 ) is an_American_actor who has_starred in many_films and on television . He is_known in the_horror_movie_community for his_work in the_films of John_Carpenter , especially his_role as Sheriff_Leigh_Brackett in Carpenter 's 1978_hit horror_movie_Halloween . He reprised this_role in the_1981_sequel_Halloween_II . He is_not_related to actor_Jon_Cypher , alongside whom he starred in Hill_Street_Blues .
